' triggered from Time Sheet's life cycle ' ' if reporting_period_started_on is not set, yet this logic assumes the life cycle ' activaes the time sheet ' ' if reporting_period_started_on is set, yet this logic assumes the life cycle ' closes the time sheet --- date (reporting_period_ended_on will be set) ' 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() Dim plmIdentity As Aras.Server.Security.Identity = Aras.Server.Security.Identity.GetByName("Aras PLM") Dim PermissionWasSet As Boolean = Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.GrantIdentity(plmIdentity)
Dim dtNow As DateTime = System.DateTime.UtcNow Dim tmpPtrn As String = "yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss" Dim tmpDt As String = dtNow.toString(tmpPtrn, DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo) Dim sCntxt As I18NSessionContext = Me.getInnovator().getI18NSessionContext() Dim myDate As String = sCntxt.ConvertUtcDateTimeToNeutral(tmpDt, tmpPtrn)
If (Me.getProperty("reporting_period_started_on","") = "") Then Me.setProperty("reporting_period_started_on", myDate) Else If Me.getProperty("reporting_period_ended_on","") <> "" Then Return Me Me.setProperty("reporting_period_ended_on", myDate) End If Me.setAttribute("version","0") Me.setAttribute("serverEvents","0") Me.setAttribute("doGetItem", "0") Me.setAction("edit") Dim res As Item = Me.apply()
If (PermissionWasSet=True) Then Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.RevokeIdentity(plmIdentity) End If Return res
